title: Chelsea Women vs Arsenal Women : Preview , predictions and lineups
body_text:
Chelsea Women vs Arsenal Women: Preview, predictions and lineups
- Chelsea Women face Arsenal Women in pre-season friendly in United States
- Both sides won the opening games of their tours against American opposition
- New signings should be handed some minutes for both teams
Chelsea and Arsenal continue their preparations ahead of the 2024/25 Women's Super League campaign on Sunday when they lock horns in a pre-season friendly in the United States.
With Sonia Bompastor having taken over from Emma Hayes in the Chelsea dugout, pre-season promises to be vital as the former Lyon coach gets her ideas across on the training field. The Blues got off to an encouraging start during the first clash of their US tour, beating Gotham FC 3-1 thanks to goals from Johanna Ryting Kaneryd and Aggie Beever-Jones.
Arsenal continue life under Jonas Eidevall for 2024/25 and they actually start their campaign before Chelsea when they face Rangers in Champions League qualification on September 4. They also won their opening match of their US adventure, coming out as 2-1 winners against Washington Spirit.
Here's 90min's preview of Sunday's pre-season clash.
What time does Chelsea vs Arsenal kick-off?
- Location: Washington, United States
- Stadium: Audi Field
- Date: Sunday 25 August
- Kick-off Time: 21:00 BST / 16:00 ET / 13:00 PT
Chelsea vs Arsenal H2H Record (Last Five Games)
- Chelsea: 2 wins
- Arsenal: 3 wins
- Draws: 0
Current form (all competitions)
How to watch Chelsea vs Arsenal on TV and live stream
Chelsea team news
Chelsea handed a debut to England international Lucy Bronze against Gotham after her switch from European champions Barcelona to Stamford Bridge. Sandy Baltimore also donned a Chelsea jersey for the first time after coming on as a second-half substitute in the 3-1 victory.
Latest recruit and Division 1 Feminine Young Player of the Season Louna Ribadeira has joined Chelsea from Paris FC but she will return to the French capital for the 2024/25 season on loan.
Chelsea predicted lineup vs Arsenal
Chelsea predicted lineup vs Arsenal (4-4-2): Hampton; Lawrence, Bright, Buchanan, Charles; Cuthbert, Kaptein, Reiten, James; Rytting Kaneryd, Beever-Jones.
Arsenal team news
Exciting summer signing Mariona Caldentey has travelled to the US with Arsenal for their two pre-season clashes but didn't feature against Washington Spirit. There was a debut for Rosa Kafaji though after her move from BC Hacken.
Arsenal's cohort of Lionesses impressed in their first friendly, with Alessia Russo bagging a brace at Audi Field. The likes of Beth Mead, Leah Williamson and Lotte Wubben-Moy all turned out across the pond.
Arsenal predicted lineup vs Chelsea
Arsenal predicted lineup vs Chelsea (4-3-3): Zinsberger; McCabe, Williamson, Wubben-Moy, Catley; Kuhl Moller, Little, Maanum; Mead, Russo, Foord.
Chelsea vs Arsenal score prediction
It's never easy to predict the outcome of a pre-season friendly given the significant rotation but both sides will be aiming to land a first psychological blow of the 2024/25 season. For Chelsea manager Bompastor, it's a chance to see how her side react to one of the WSL's best teams.
There should be goals in Washington and very little to separate two impressive attacking sides, so we're backing an entertaining draw.
